---
title: "Average_Homerange_Calculation"
output: html_document
---
This script is used to test average home range isopleth areas for different deer inside and outside of the fire.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
table <- read.csv(here::here("Publication_Data","Collars","Isopleth_Areas.csv"))
table.wide <- table %>% pivot_wider(id_cols=Deer, names_from = Time, values_from = Area.km2.)

#For Fire Does
#Pre
#avg=0.1545283, SD = 0.05280162
#Post
#avg=0.2612817, SD = 0.200672
Fire<- table.wide[c(2,3,6:9,11:13,16:17),]
mean(Fire$Pre)
sd(Fire$Pre)
mean(Fire$Post)
sd(Fire$Post)

#Outside Fire Does
OFire<- table.wide[-c(2,3,6:9,11:12,13:15,17),]
mean(OFire$Pre)
sd(OFire$Pre)
mean(OFire$Post)
sd(OFire$Post)
#t=-1.9658, df=10, p=0.07768, mean dif =-0.071
t.test(Fire$Pre, Fire$Post, paired=T, var.equal = F)

#t = -1.0735, df = 5, p-value = 0.3321, mean dif =-0.044
t.test(OFire$Pre, OFire$Post, paired=T, var.equal=F)
```
